name: Story: The Afterlife Heaven or Hell Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU; 1024 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might experience a few seconds of lag accessing menus or loading new maps if your CPU is old. Turn off other programs before running.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU; 2048 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended.
